RelativeTransform:
Effect-to-camera transform to allow arbitrary placement of the particle system .
Note the X component of the location will be scaled with camera fov to keep the lens effect the same apparent size.
BaseFOV: This is the assumed FOV for which the effect was authored. The code will make automatic adjustments to make it look the same at different FOVs
EmittersToTreatAsSame:
If an emitter class in this array is currently playing, do not play this effect.
Useful for preventing multiple similar or expensive camera effects from playing simultaneously.
bAllowMultipleInstances: true if multiple instances of this emitter can exist simultaneously, false otherwise.
bResetWhenRetriggered: If bAllowMultipleInstances is true and this effect is retriggered, the particle system will be reset if this is true
